task: Touch the button to add a new record.
task_end_condition: The task is known to be completed when Jade successfully navigates to the AddNewRecord page.

working_memory.description: Touch on a button that has resource_id "fab"

The action of touching the button with resource_id "fab" transitioned the user from the HomeRecord screen to the AddNewRecord screen. Notably, a button with content_desc "Navigate up" was introduced, indicating an option to return to the previous screen. (page changed from HomeRecord to AddNewRecord)
Touch on a button that has text "Category:, Food - Breakfast"

The user has navigated to the "CategorySelection" screen, where a new textview displaying "Category" has appeared, along with a listview showing various categories and a specific subcategory titled "Breakfast." This indicates that the user is now able to select from a range of categories for their record. (page changed from AddNewRecord to CategorySelection)
Touch on a button that has text "Breakfast"

The screen transitioned from the Category Selection page to a new interface that includes a prompt for auto-filling by category, featuring a checkbox for user preferences and two buttons labeled "NO" and "YES". Additionally, a temporary popup message displayed advertisements and information before disappearing.
Touch on a button that has text "YES"

After touching the "YES" button, the user is taken to the "Add New Record" screen, which introduces a new layout with various buttons and text views related to recording a transaction, including options for category, account, project, payee, and status. The previous options for auto-fill and the "CategorySelection" are no longer visible. (page changed from CategorySelection to AddNewRecord)

Jade Green successfully navigated to the AddNewRecord page and has interacted with the necessary options; however, further actions are needed to complete the record entry. Jade Green needs to explore the "Account:", "Project:", "Payee:", and "Note:" fields to fill in the necessary details for the new record before saving it.
Touch on a button that has text "Account:, Cash"
